text: 'Sup, you beautiful bastards? I hope you're having a fantastic Monday.
Unfortunately, the main gist of this video,
for those that are gonna dislike and leave,
the main gist of this video is that there will be no Philip DeFranco shows this week.
I will come back next Monday.
I do apologize for not giving you the heads-up before this,
uh, it really- I didn't come to this conclusion
until as I started to film today's video.
I wanna preface this with, I love my job,
I am one of the most lucky sons-of-bitches on the planet to have it,
I'm not complaining about this relationship with us.
I love this, but right now there's a lot of personal, and even more business stuff that is-
that is really just destroying me.
It's been a hard two years, it's been an immensely hard five months,
and it is this week...
It's gotten to the point that I'm having panic attacks, and I can't sleep,
and it's- life has become not enjoyable.
And once again, it's not the making the videos,
it's everything that's toxic around it right now.
Things that could even prevent me from legally making the show in the future.
Road blocks and ridiculousness I have to deal with every single day.
And other things that have been making my dream job an exhausting nightmare scenario that I feel like,
until this past week I've been able to emotionally compartmentalize.
And as I started filming the show today, I knew that that was going to seep into today's show,
and I was going to make a video I didn't want to make,
and I was gonna hate it,
and it was gonna suck.
And I promised myself a while ago, I would not put out videos that I did not want to do.
If I don't take the time to handle the core problem, everything will spiral.
And as someone who's done this for a long time,
I knew that if I continued without-
without taking a second to breathe, and to game plan,
and get all my ducks in a row and make everything good,
that I was just gonna burn out or implode.
And please know, this is not a plea for pity. I am, in general, in a great place.
Uh, know that this is not me seeking views.
And know that this isn't an attempt to make easy money.
I'm gonna take the ads off of this video. I just-
I wanted to one, say that I'm not gonna be doing shows this week.
Inform you, make sure you're in the loop.
And two, let you know why, or as much as I can tell you legally,
because I feel like we do have a relationship.
And while I feel like some people are gonna take away something negative from this,
I just- I really want you to know that...
I respect your time, and I don't want to disrespect you by keeping you out of the conversation.
Main point, I love yo faces, I do hope you have a fantastic week,
and I will see you Monday.
